verses.name: 2 Chronicles 10:12
verses.text: So Jeroboam and all the people came to Rehoboam on the third day, as the king bade, saying, Come again to me on the third day.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 10:13
verses.text: And the king answered them roughly; and king Rehoboam forsook the counsel of the old men,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 10:14
verses.text: And answered them after the advice of the young men, saying, My father made your yoke heavy, but I will add thereto: my father chastised you with whips, but I will chastise you with scorpions.
